name: Balance of World
summary:
The world where two races live.
As the god of the world, you have to lead them to live in peace and a balanced way.
The effort to create your own perfect world have been fraught with repeated setbacks.
When you created just a beautiful and peaceful world, people became complacent and lazy.
That caused the destruction of the world.
When you created a rough and tough world, people got tired so much.
That caused another destruction of the world.
After these failures,
you realized that both peace and tension are essential for the sustenance of the world successfully.
Accordingly, you made one more race to live with people.
Now, you have to lead them to live a balanced life to keep the world.
